DOC.brief_summary: To determine the effect of ambient PM2.5 exposures at "low levels" in Southeastern Michigan and "high levels" in beijing on lipid metabolism among healthy adults without CV disease.
DOC.brief_title: Air Pollution and Lipids Metabolic Disorder
DOC.criteria: without CV disease or risk factors (e.g., hypertension, diabetes, or treated hyperlipidemia). Subjects are nonsmokers in nonsmoking household. Screening visit BP>140/90 mm Hg, fasting glucose >126 mg/dL, or positive urine pregnancy test (females). Subjects cannot be taking any medications or overthecounter drugs that affect CV function.
